markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Night Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=5723) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=750" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can tap into the magic that runs through your blood. You gain [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1440) (wolf only, using the statistics for a canine) and [_mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1606) as 2nd-rank divine innate spells. You can cast each of these spells once per day.
name: Night Magic

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Night Magic Source Player Core 2 pg. 43 1.1 --- You can tap into the magic that runs through your blood. You gain animal form (wolf only, using the statistics for a canine) and mist as 2nd-rank divine innate spells. You can cast each of these spells once per day.
